title: 37 Tickets, 14 Days, Locked out from Riot Support - Calling a Rioter
body:
So I did not want it to come for this as I do not like to create a scene. 

I had been banned for '3rd Party Applications' for just over 2 weeks now. 
I freaked out when I first saw the ban notification. I had quickly opened up a support ticket in hopes that the matter could be resolved quickly. I reviewed my match history to see if I had been compromised and found nothing suspicious.  

Riot support did what Riot support usually do in this situation and tell me nothing can be done. Reviewing the forums also quickly diminished my optimism that this will be resolved soon. But I had faith that this has all been one big mistake and something must of tripped their systems. 
I was never rude to the support team at most somewhat sassy when they started repeating themselves. 

Moving on, the little information I could squeeze out that is that I had apparently been scripting 'multiple times' and that I may have even been reported for scripting which apparently led them to the conclusion that I was. 
I skimmed over my match history all the way back to the start of 2016 and found nothing obvious that I had been compromised. Riot also confirmed that I had not been.  
I have been accused of scripting once years ago in an Aram but otherwise I don't exactly play that well to put myself in a position to be accused as one. Possibly I had a good game and someone did report me I cant say for sure. 
I do know that all games at least in the last year or so was done from the same PC which is shared by no one and is password protected. I also trust my roommates and am confident no one jumped on and did any funny business. 

I tried to identify the source of the trigger. 

They dismissed Overwolf, Razer Synapse and Discord. I even confirmed that it was not due to a little Macro I had on my keyboard that just send a message in chat, something I had for months and did not do anything advantageous in league. When I asked about couple of VPNs I use for work they never gave me an answer or even acknowledged I asked about it. I didn't press the matter as I doubt a VPN would of been the issue. 

I even had a bunch of snippets from Overwolf which are generated whenever a Kill or Death happened in game. It only had my last bunch of games however I uploaded it and gave it to Riot in hopes that it would help. They ignored it for a long time. Despite my constant attempts to get them to view it they did not even acknowledge I had asked them such a thing. Eventually one outright stated that unless I had video of EVERY SINGLE full match game from the very first time I played league until I got banned 'It wouldn't prove anything.' I tried to argue that just one of those games had to be one I was 'triggered' on to help show my innocence but they ignored me yet again. 

Taking a different route I tried to ask them what THEY would do in my situation. And getting nothing more then 'opening a ticket' they carried on trying to convince me that I had indeed been scripting. 

Regardless of how much I insisted that I had not and tried to prove it, I would be ignored simply stating that they had 'double checked and confirmed I 100% was.' I asked the ticket to be escalated I asked for a Rioter but they merely repeated the same thing.  

Eventually things degraded. They announced that they would no longer listen to me and that they would close any follow up ticket immediately upon my opening it stating that the 'issue was resolved in X ticket'. 
Me being at this point frustrated and persistent to prove my innocence reopened the tickets stating that my matter was not resolved and that I had been banned unfairly. This ended up being a series petty copy paste replies from both sides for a couple of days. I was persistent to restore my falsely banned account and I had literally no other option other then to let my account die for no reason what so ever. 

Finally a few hours ago I got an email yet again that my ticket was closed. Attempting to log in I found I could not. And upon checking the email I had found that they no longer wanted to deal with me and have removed my zendesk account to stop me from replying. 

So now I am here. Still trucking on too prove my innocence. I did not want to post here as the forums general take on these things as 'Guilty until proven innocent.' But as I have no choice. Here I am and that is my story. I hope a Rioter sees this and can help me more then I have been the last few weeks.

Kind Regards,
Antiweapon

Update:
Here is the transcript of the tickets. I skipped. out the dozens of copy paste locked tickets. 
I am unsure if this will in any way help but at the very least it will show that I did all I thought I could via the tickets. 
[Link](http://imgur.com/Ij7wpa6)

replies.body:
If you want some attempted help from people on boards then I'd recommend posting your support tickets (make an imgur album or something). Because as you say atm, there isn't much to convince us of your innocence. The fact that over 47 tickets they have still said no is pretty damning. People  have been unbanned from this before when it was a false positive, so what makes your case so different?

At least with your support tickets visible (ofc remove any personal info) we can have some context. All we have now is your word against theirs and VERY rarely is their word wrong. It doesn't exactly paint you in the best light. Assuming you are innocent, then you would be surprised at the lengths some people will go to to try and recover a bought/boosted/scripted etc account despite the fact they knowingly broke the rules.
___
As a result, in these kind of posts there are four outcomes:

On boards the most common tends to be that the account owner has given their details to a booster who has then used scripts on the account. Since it doesn't qualify as compromise they lose that account. 

The second is ofc those that are simply lying and are trying to garner sympathy in a long shot hope to get the account back. 

Third is compromise, at which point you'll go through the account recovery process to prove ownership, change up your passwords and you'll get the account unbanned (usually, they have no obligation to do this since the account still broke the rules, but we can't say Riot are unreasonable on this one).

And very last is a false positive. They don't happen very often at all. More often than not a false positive is triggered by a remnant of some disallowed program that wasn't removed properly (which isn't technically a *false* positive, just a misleading one).
___

My point is you have to understand that this doesn't look good for you here. With that many tickets I assume you have talked to multiple support agents, all of whom deemed the ban appropriate. So at least, give us some context.

Okay. I have loaded up the transcript of the tickets. 
I hope it in some way helps. At the very least it I hope it shows I tried to be civil and honest to support about everything I could.

Hello Seras, 

That's completely fair. I understand that it does not look good for me. And I do understand that Riot does most likely get a huge amounts of these with people who have legitimately earned their bans complaining about it being unfair. Unfortunately It is really hard to prove otherwise as riot cant provide me any information to help convince them and the only information I could provide them was apparently not enough. 

If you believe it will help I can quite happily post a transcript of all the replies from the tickets. However since I have been locked out of the support website I have to go through a huge mountain of emails so give me some time and I will try and get them up here. 

In regards to your potential outcomes. 

- Boosting
I rarely play ranked. And when I do its mostly due to preferring draft due to being able to ban. I am a lowely bronze 3 atm however I was in Silver in season 4 my total ranked games each season probebly was no more then 20 at best.  I hope for this reason its obvious I did not attempt to boost. (If I did I probably shod ask for my money back haha. )

- Lying
I cant say much as its my word against Riots. As I will show in the tickets soon I really do not see any point to scripting as there is no point to winning a game like this. I get bored of a game if someone on the enemy team leaves and its a 4v5. An unfair game is a boring one. However I understand that you cant just take my word for it. 

- Compromise
I have looked at my match history as I stated for the past year. I didn't go in depth on each game but I couldn't see any point where I suddenly became a diamond 5 vayne. I play almost always exclusively with the same 5 people in my whole time in league and am always in comms with them. If any were in the game with me I can guarantee that it was me playing. 
Riot had also looked into it and stated that I indeed was not compromised. 

- False Positive
I cant say for sure what the cause may be for this in all honestly. The only program I can think of that has been on Riots radar was Curse but as far as I am aware no one was banned for it and I never used it in league, it was merely my addon manager in world of warcraft. That said I would of rarely updated it so maybe that could of been it?
I have had lolreplay and LSI at one point or another probably over a year now both from my understanding were perfectly acceptable by Riot. 

Thank you for taking the time to reply. I will take your advice and get the transcript together.

The reason Riot doesn't give out specific information regarding these bans is so scripters/3rd party users don't know what was detected (and therefore what wasn't).

As has been mentioned, Overwolf and Discord have never had any problems. Curse did at one point but Curse fixed on their end and noone was banned for it (afaik) since it was a new precedent Riot had to set. Lolreplay and LSI are both fine however LSI does fall under the "acceptable but still use at your own risk as we have no control over the changes they make or features they include" kind of thing. That said I've never heard of anyone banned for LSI, and it wouldn't be an isolated case if something had changed there.
___
As for your tickets (thank you for sharing):

With regards to the Garen thing you mention, the thread has since been deleted so I don't have context on that, but sounds like an isolated incident kind of thing that was identified and resolved.

The issue with the recent third party ban wave has since been resolved (was fixed within a day or two of the false bans going out), and I'm pretty sure was isolated to NA, but it may have just looked that way because of the population of OCE (i.e noone on OCE was unlucky enough to be hit by it), but given they only announced it on NA, that makes me thing it was just them.

There are a lot of claims about Razer Synapse or Razer Cortex causing issues, but it's never these programs in the end. I think there was a point where Cortex caused a few issues, but like the problems with the recent ban wave, it was resolved quickly and is no longer an issue. Most of the threads you mention there fall under first two categories of my first post to you, the reason they are all from similar times is because of the ban wave format that Riot uses for these bans.

As for the short form responses, Support are very busy, and from their eyes your ticket is basically "I was banned unfairly and I'm disputing it but it totally looks like I'm lying". Pair that with the limited information they can actually provide about these bans leaves a short "sorry we checked but the answer is still no" as the best answer they can give you. They don't have time to go into the details of each link you sent and provide you with reasons why they were banned (falsely or otherwise).

A text macro or VPN would not cause this either, so they are not your problem.

You've gone through 10 different support agents and they all said no. Which indicates that there is some very compelling evidence against your account. Sometimes one agent gets it wrong, sometimes even two do, but ten? There has to be something that looks very bad to them on your account.

I would also like to mention that none of these responses are macro responses. They have all the same keywords and all that but those agents are taking the time to actually write back to you. They answer a lot of the same questions (especially about these types of bans) so their responses tend to be pretty similar, but that doesn't mean they aren't treating your case as an individual, it just means they've developed habits over time of what information to include.
___
What Turexinus Rex said pretty much sums it up. You are saying you are innocent, but all of those agents are sitting there looking at solid proof that not only were the rules broken, but they were broken in such a way it could not have been an accident (3 or 4 of them alluded to this). 

From what they see they've essentially walked in on you stealing diamonds from a jeweller, and you are trying to convince them it wasn't you, while they are standing there looking at you holding the Diamonds and the glass cutter. There may well be incredibly extraneous circumstances that would lead you to this point as an innocent but it's far less likely than the obvious alternative.

It's not a matter of them not reading what you have written, rather I think they all did read everything you wrote, but that doesn't change what they see, nor does it change the fact they can't tell you what was detected.

As for escalating your ticket, I'm not familiar with many of the support peeps but I'm pretty sure it was escalated, and all agents came to the same conclusion. The people above support are likely only in supervisory roles and may not even be affiliated with Riot systems in any way, so upper support is as far as your ticket can go.

As for them finally banning your support account, you sent them 37 tickets in two weeks about a matter they could not give you any more information on, that is to be expected. It's the same principle as us permanently banning excessive spammers here on boards.
___

Ok I've explained as best I can. I'll do some digging but no promises, I'm trying to stay on the fence with this one but it's difficult to believe your innocence when there is this much stacked against you, though you do get points for not being a total assbag to support (I don't care if you are innocent, being a piece of shit to the people who exist to help you doesn't exactly garner any sympathy nor a desire to help). As little as it is comparative to support I will do what I can though, but you will likely have to be patient.

Hello again. 

First off thanks again for taking the time to reply. 

I fully understand why support don't let on what caused the trigger. Unfortunately though that makes refuting a false ban really hard as you have no idea what or when could have caused it. 

In regards to the applications I listed I didn't really have much else to go on. I just looked at what I currently had installed that would in some way have had any interaction with league. 
Other then the ones I listed there isnt much else. Vmware Workstation, ShareX (formally Puush), one drive. Things I wouldn't think would have any interaction at all. 
As I could not get any information from Support (and I understand why.) I basically had to throw things at them in hopes I hit the mark. 

The garen thing was a long shot. I did notice when the Skim Spotlight guy did a live stream for the practice mode he sometimes was able to double trigger an ability before it went on the 0.5second cooldown. I noticed something similar with Garens E in urf before I was banned so I suspected it could be related. 

The mass accidental ban in NA and a few of the other threads I listed were more to show that the system wasent infailable. I was mostly trying to make a point that support have been wrong in the past. A couple of times only after a Rioter jumped into the thread and picked up  something support did not. I really did not have much to go on but that seemed to be one of the few times I saw these matters get resolved I obviously don't know how many people are banned falsely and who is just trying to cheat their way out of a deserved ban. Hence why I tried to get one of 'those' Rioters to jump in. Someone with more visibility or whatever it is that makes them be able to resolve the cases support cannot. It was a long shot but I thought asking for someone with more visibility would surely help  find the problem. 

I gathered something has me looking really guilty. And I fully understand why 10 people confirming as much makes it look really bad. But if you see it from my perspective I didnt really have any idea what else to do other then to reopen the ticket and keep fighting. 

And as for the macro responses thing. I know they did not just copy and paste a reply I probably should of worded it better. It was more that I was getting the same information again and again. I get that something is plastering a big guilty on my forehead. I believe the support team that something is amiss for them to believe it and stand by it. It was more that I felt that they followed the same procedures as the last and I was trying to push for some new development to be made to look else ware, as you probably could of figured I felt frustrated as I felt I was going around in circles. 

And I know my spamming ticket after ticket was stubborn but I felt like I had no choice and I had n other means of trying to convince them. 

I have no rush I can wait months if needed. I just want to make sure everything possible is done to potentially fix this. 

As for support I don't see any reason to yell and be vulgar to them. Being rude can only hinder my chances of getting this fairly resolved and as I have also worked in a support role before I can understand how frustrating it can be getting assholes day after day. 

I can also supply you with my complete match history here ( I believe you can only see my ranked games?) and my videos I mentioned in the ticket via link on a PM. They have my comms on it so I refrained from putting the links on the screenshot of the tickets as I am unsure if my friends would want their QQing on mumble listed publicly. 

Regardless of the outcome I thank you for taking the time to help me again I know its a big ask.

I understand the frustration, both sides have hit a wall. Like I said I'll do what I can, there isn't really anything else you can give me that would have any worth for this so I think it'll just be a waiting game for now.

Heyo Seras Dragon.

How have you been?

I am not trying to bother you or push things along as stated before I can wait months if needed. I just want to confirm that I am still in a Que somewhere. 

Once again, appreciate the help, if there is anything I can do to help this along I will be happy to oblige.
Hmm for some reason I was under the impression this was resolved. I'll chase it up again for you.

Hey Seras.

Its been another 4 weeks so I am just popping in to make sure I am still some Que. 

Been checking daily, still trying to be optimistic that I can resolve this issue. 
Been playing on an alt on the rare occasion but its pretty depressing. 

Once again. Anything I can do to help clear my name let me know. Happy to do it.
I think someone will get back to you soon but last I heard it wasn't looking good.

Thats really devastating to hear. There HAS to be some avenue i can take to clear my name.

I am desperately trying to proove my innocence here legit anything i can do to convince you guys i will do.

Hobestly to whatever rioter reads this. PLEASE believe me when I say i have not attenpted to cheat in your game ever!

There really has to be something i can do here...

Hi Antiweapon,

I personally investigated your account, and passed it on to our Anticheat team for review. I was actually the second Rioter to pass your case on, including all information you provided, and both times Anticheat have said that they confirmed the detection to be legitimate.

I also found no indication of account compromise.

Unfortunately, there isn't anything else I can do to investigate further.

Hello Gehirn,

I am sorry but I cannot take that response. 

I was hoping that once a name in red saw it something will be noticed and my innocence would be proven...  
I don't know what else to do but I am PLEADING you to believe that I have not in any way attempted to cheat in your game or ANY multiplayer game. 

You don't understand how messed up this feels. 
I have tried my best to uphold the ToS and have gotten scared to even tread the line (in regards to arguing or swearing or ragequitting.)

PLEASE just look at my history in game. Look at my reports. I have reported people for the very reason I am apparently banned for. Why would I do that?

I am asking you to please do anything to help me here I am desperate to get my account back so I can play this game again and enjoy it like I used to.  

Hearing people tell me and others to kill themselves constantly and it takes a number of reports for them to get a mear 14 day ban and from then they have to keep that going to get permad. While I got knocked out of the ballpark for something I cant even attempt to figure out how I triggered. 

Take my record into account. Look at all my chat history. I am sure something somewhere will show the kind of person I am. 

I am sorry but I wont settle for this... I don't know what I can do at this point... but I will keep trying. I am been completely honest here I have not and will not ever cheat.

I know I am just some number in the system and that the likely hood of you believing me is nill. And that you will go on your days and not remember or care about this random user.  But please see me as a person here, think about how much time I have spend trying to fight this the stress and effort I have gone through already. I am sure you guys can see something about the amount of times I have logged and viewed this thread or other threads in hopes of finding information. 

Had I been any sort of 3rd party hacker I would of bought another level 30 account and went about my apparent hacking ways, moreso I am not stupid enough to try cheat and especially not stupid enough to do it on my main account, using my gamertag that I have used for over 10 years now in various games and I am very attached to. 

If you cant help then PLEASE give me someway I can keep going. Someone I can talk to. Something I can do to help. 

Put me on 'probation' I don't know... Give me 1 hour long ques monitor me. SOMETHING. 

Worst case scenario and I get banned again. 

Best case another innocent player plays your game as it is designed and intended. 
Even if I did cheat (which I didn't). The likelihood of me being stupid enough to do said '3rd party scripting' would be nill. 


I will not stop the stress of this is driving me insane. You have GOT to believe me. PLEASE.
Just wondering if they have done anything since this last post?

No not yet. 
Gehirn has not made any post on the forums since the last one with me.. so I am hoping hes just been bussy and isn't just ignoring me at this point.

So I have been waiting patiently for 20 days or so (after waiting a month between Seras Dragons posts.) For any followup to this. 
I assumed you were busy since you had not replied to any forum posts since then. 

I have been checking essentially daily and often multiple times a day for any response from you. Today it appears you have come back from whatever has been keeping you occupied. 

So I would like to state again. I did not cheat. I will never cheat. I want to know what I can do for you to convince you that I have not. 

I ask that you have the decency to not simply ignore me I feel like that's all that has happened these past few months and its hard to not get the impression everyone is trying to wear me down until I stop replying. 

Hope to hear from you soon. 

Kind Regards,
Antiweapon

Hi Antiweapon,

I apologize for not getting back to you. But sadly, when I said there was nothing I nor anyone could do, I meant it.
Whether I believe you or not is not the point. If I was in your situation and I had indeed not been cheating I would feel the same sense of injustice, anxiety, and frustration. The emotions you express are not lost on me, but I cannot act on them.

Now, cheaters do lie to us every single day. Cheaters have even gone so far as to share and develop, among each other, different things to say to us in order to try and pull on our heart strings or display an uncompromising or impeccable character in order to get unbanned.
I'm not calling you a liar, but I am saying that I have no choice but to believe in the accuracy of the detection against your account.
I have gone as far as I can to confirm that there was no suspicious activity that could indicate you were not at fault, and the anticheat team has tripled checked the veracity of the detection.

Now, the only way that your account could possibly be unbanned is if we determine that there was some fault in the detection. It has happened in the past, but it is exceedingly rare and as of right now, we have no evidence for this being the case.

Hey dude,

I've not forgotten about you. In this situation when it's difficult for me to do anything I have had to prioritize other work.

I've spent many hours poring over your case recently. I've sent you a ticket.

hello Gehrin

I get your ignoring me because you feel its not worth your time.

However like I keep saying I want to sort this issue out. 

I am still asking for a chance to proove myself because I will never cheat.

You must realise this means alot to me by now. And i am getting sick of waiting months between a reply that up untill now has been a broken record.

I would like to have a conversation and not just sit here stressing.

I am even contemplating starting a legal process for the sole purpose of actually talking to somone and getting a reply within the same few seconds. 

I am also gonna try work on triggering this false ban via the chat macro again to see if i can proove my innocence once I get back to Australia.

Please stop ignoring me,
Antiweapon

Hello again Gehrin, 

Just writing to let you know that I am not giving up and am still here eagerly waiting on your reply to my previous enquiries.

I am currently traveling through europe, however the false banning of my account is still a thorn jabbing into my side that i cannot shake even tho the trip so far has been fantastic!

Please check it was not infact the chat macro.
And once again I would like to stress that i will do whatever I can to help you believe with confidence that i was not cheating.

Hope to hear from you soon.

Kind Regards,
Antiweapon

Hello Gehirn, 

Still stressing on this, still trying to solve this issue. 

I keep reviewing what I have running on my computer and I cannot fathom what could have caused the false positive. 

The thing that is bugging me at the moment is the 'chat macro' I said I had used in the support tickets and also  I believe in this thread. 

I am wondering if the macro 'failed' by not opening the chat window and as a result mashed a bunch of my keys in game (Namely 'You Face Jaraxxus' and 'Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion' and possibly 'MUDAMUDAMUDA' ) could possible be what triggered this? 

The Macro has failed once or twice (mostly because I had the chat window already open) but I did not think much of it as I don't recall being in any scenario where I could have influenced the game both positively or negatively from it misfiring.

Once again this was all done in Razer Synapse and under the assumption that the chat macros were ok to use.

Hello Gehrin

You are basically saying that i should stop trying and that the chance of this resolving itself are nill. So i should just accept my fate and not do anything despite the fact you guys most likely wont notice the mistake ever?

And you dont see anything wrong with that at all?

I am not sure how you expect me to just take that and be a ok with it.

I completely understand that you get cheaters that do lie and try pull on heartstrings. I have seen that constantly in the time I have been browsing these forums for answers.

I have seen you savagely shut these people down before.. again and again. I believe you when you say people play nice to try trick you guys.

However you cannot say that your hands are completly tied. The rules are made and enforced by you and your team. The fact that no means exist for people like me to proove their worth is quite frankly insane.
You preach reform and second chances and with verbal abuse cases there are three hurdles to jump before you end up perma banned. Whereas i get tripped by the wrong stars aligning and get hit with the hardest punishment with no chance at 'reforming'.

At this point i am not asking for a quick solution. I am asking for A solution. 

Ban me for a year.
Make me sign some legal mumbo jumbo.
I can come to oce hq and talk with your janitor if itll help.

Anything at all. You really cannot expect me to leave it.

I cannot even dedicate myself to a new account because I have no idea what hit the first one... I fully expect my alt to ne banned eventually because nothing has changed on my pc since I have received this ban.

League was one of my favourites games... to just be treated as collateral and pushed to the dirt is insanly depressing.

I am BEGGING you to take some initiative and talk to the right people about what can be done... not simply following a protocol.

I am the one with my hands tied.. not you.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=HjzEOAEB,comment-id=000000040000,timestamp=2017-05-08T00:33:58.407+0000)
>
> We don't instantly permaban players for their first offence. We believe in offering the chance for reform. It is because of this opportunity for reform that we're able to be confident in a permaban being well deserved. (There are instances where a player can be permabanned more quickly though, reserved for the very worst offenders)
> 
> In that month of reports I was referring to, the player was chat restricted twice and given a two week suspension. The very first report after their two week suspension ended resulted in a permanent suspension.


I still maintain that I have never once done anything against the ToS. But even so don't I fall into this category?  Do you not believe in second chances? Can you honestly say with 100% certainty after 3 months of me DAILY trying to fight this that you don't have a shred of doubt? That reply of yours was submitted less than a month ago. 

Give me a chance PLEASE. I can guarantee you that you will not be disappointed in the end result.

I'll leave the rest to Gehirn but what he mentioned there only applies to behaviour bans since it's emotion based and can be reformed. Cheating on the other hand is a premeditated decision to ruin other people's games in a way that players have no way to counter (you can't mute scripts after all), hence cheating in any form is an instant permanent suspension.

I am not trying to force you to do anything of the sort, i apologies if i had given that impression.

I am merely trying to make a point that both kinds of cases can are not so simple in regards to the intensity of the ban. 

The main point being some people do things knowingly and get banned for them. Rage/cheat ect. Some people don't or do so as a one off and learn. Fortunately they will get a slap on the wrist with a 14 day ban. Potentially fix their behavior ect (in extreme cases a straight up perma but seeing some of the logs of the 14 day banns it would have to be pretty extreme. )

In my case i have no forewarning. No 'hey fix this up' just straight up ban from using a program so good not even the user had any idea it was there (and still cant find it). Why can I not get the same act of kindness that the guy that told someone to kill themselves got? It would mean the world to me and very little effort to just ban me again if I turned out to be lying. 

Once again i know you have no power to influence anything. But I really want to make my point about it i feel like there is no reason why I cant ask for the same sort of chance to prove myself as some of the most horrid people on earth.

And most likely Gehirm will either tell me the same thing again or no longer reply. I will probably get banned from the forums for continued persistence of this and resort to sending letters to riot or something.

Regardless thanks for doing this much seras. Appreciated really.
